## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.setDragGrid() method

Sets the grid that should be used when dragging elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDragGrid(grid: Grid): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  grid | Grid | \[x, y\] grid. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
